ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( N e. ZZ -> N e. CC ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> N e. CC ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_2timesd | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( 2 x. N ) = ( N + N ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmY ( 2 x. N ) ) = ( A rmY ( N + N ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_rmyadd | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmY ( N + N ) ) = ( ( ( A rmY N ) x. ( A rmX N ) ) + ( ( A rmX N ) x. ( A rmY N ) ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_3anidm23 | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmY ( N + N ) ) = ( ( ( A rmY N ) x. ( A rmX N ) ) + ( ( A rmX N ) x. ( A rmY N ) ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_2cnd | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> 2 e. CC ) |
| 8 |  | #P_frmx | |- rmX : ( ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) X. ZZ ) --> NN0 |
| 9 | 8 | #P_fovcl | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmX N ) e. NN0 ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_nn0cnd | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmX N ) e. CC ) |
| 11 |  | #P_frmy | |- rmY : ( ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) X. ZZ ) --> ZZ |
| 12 | 11 | #P_fovcl | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmY N ) e. ZZ ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_zcnd | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmY N ) e. CC ) |
| 14 | 7, 10, 13 | #P_mulassd | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( 2 x. ( A rmX N ) ) x. ( A rmY N ) ) = ( 2 x. ( ( A rmX N ) x. ( A rmY N ) ) ) ) |
| 15 | 10, 13 | #P_mulcld | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( A rmX N ) x. ( A rmY N ) ) e. CC ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_2timesd | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( 2 x. ( ( A rmX N ) x. ( A rmY N ) ) ) = ( ( ( A rmX N ) x. ( A rmY N ) ) + ( ( A rmX N ) x. ( A rmY N ) ) ) ) |
| 17 | 10, 13 | #P_mulcomd | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( A rmX N ) x. ( A rmY N ) ) = ( ( A rmY N ) x. ( A rmX N ) ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( ( A rmX N ) x. ( A rmY N ) ) + ( ( A rmX N ) x. ( A rmY N ) ) ) = ( ( ( A rmY N ) x. ( A rmX N ) ) + ( ( A rmX N ) x. ( A rmY N ) ) ) ) |
| 19 | 14, 16, 18 | #P_3eqtrrd | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( ( A rmY N ) x. ( A rmX N ) ) + ( ( A rmX N ) x. ( A rmY N ) ) ) = ( ( 2 x. ( A rmX N ) ) x. ( A rmY N ) ) ) |
| 20 | 4, 6, 19 | #P_3eqtrd | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmY ( 2 x. N ) ) = ( ( 2 x. ( A rmX N ) ) x. ( A rmY N ) ) ) |
